data.name: Boring Man: Platinum Weapon Skins
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

Platinum weapon skins are only available in the rewrite beta. Purchasing this DLC will give you instant access to the beta when it becomes available March 8th!

                        


About the Game

Do you think your weapons aren't shiny enough? Do you not like the sparkle of gold weapons but not the urine-like color? Well have *I* got the microtransaction for you.

                                        

Platinum weapon skins are unique skins that can only be unlocked through this DLC!

This DLC will unlock Platinum weapon skins for all existing weapons in the game! As always, these weapon skins are NOT pay-to-win and are purely cosmetic.

                                        

You do not need Premium or to be level 100 to use these weapon skins, you can equip them right away.

data.short_description: Unlock the Platinum weapon skins for all the weapons in Boring Man!

fullgame.name: Boring Man - Online Tactical Stickman Combat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Boring Man contains depictions of violence and "pixel blood". The characters in Boring Man can die in a variety of gruesome ways, but the pixel art keeps it silly.
